SEARCH
Package tps.tp4

Class Colony

java.lang.Object
tps.tp4.Colony
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Colony extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a colony in the game, managing resources, settlers, and structures.
See Also:
